overview:
Based in Kelowna, British Columbia I have developed an extensive technical background over the past 13 years. It began with online marketing and sales for a few software companies in North and South America. This forced me to learn about software development during the dot-com-bubble. With the evolution of the world wide web I started studying web and graphic design [thank you WordPress], search engine marketing, affiliate marketing investor and public relations. In doing so I got a strong understanding of business planning and have used that to develop several successful business ventures. I am currently working on Appiphany Technologies.

Our newest project is the MMA Animals brand. A fantasy based interactive CG cartoon / game. The worlds first fantasy mixed martial arts brand. Predevelopment of the MMA Animals is underway and we hope to offer MMA Animals products before Summer 2012.
